languages.text: "Ты не представляешь, что несут еретики перед смертью. Глядя в дуло дробовика, они скажут что угодно, чтобы нагадить напоследок".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Argenta's first quest (to clear out a cultist den on Footfall).
Idira: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: "Ты не представляешь, что несут еретики перед смертью. Глядя в дуло дробовика, они скажут что угодно, чтобы нагадить напоследок".

languages.text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Argenta's first quest (to clear out a cultist den on Footfall).
Idira: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."
languages.original_text: "Ты не представляешь, что несут еретики перед смертью. Глядя в дуло дробовика, они скажут что угодно, чтобы нагадить напоследок".

traits.locale_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."
"You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."
"You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

"You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

languages.text: 「異端者どもが死の間際に吐き出すくだらない戯言には、驚かされるよ。ショットガンの銃口を目の前に突きつけられれば、連中は処刑人を苛立たせるためだけに、どんなことでも口にする」
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者どもが死の間際に吐き出すくだらない戯言には、驚かされるよ。ショットガンの銃口を目の前に突きつけられれば、連中は処刑人を苛立たせるためだけに、どんなことでも口にする」

languages.text: "Ihr würdet Euch wundern, welchen Unsinn Ketzer vor dem Tod von sich geben. Wenn sie in den Lauf einer Schrotflinte starren, sagen sie alles, nur um ihren Henker zu ärgern."
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr würdet Euch wundern, welchen Unsinn Ketzer vor dem Tod von sich geben. Wenn sie in den Lauf einer Schrotflinte starren, sagen sie alles, nur um ihren Henker zu ärgern."

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas toutes les foutaises que les hérétiques peuvent proférer avant de mourir. Quand ils sont nez à nez avec le canon d'un fusil, ils sont prêts à dire n'importe quoi pour contrarier leur bourreau. »
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas toutes les foutaises que les hérétiques peuvent proférer avant de mourir. Quand ils sont nez à nez avec le canon d'un fusil, ils sont prêts à dire n'importe quoi pour contrarier leur bourreau. »

languages.text: «Le sorprendería la cantidad de pamplinas que sueltan los herejes antes de morir. Cuando les encañonan con una escopeta, dirían cualquier cosa con tal de agraviar a su verdugo».
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: «Le sorprendería la cantidad de pamplinas que sueltan los herejes antes de morir. Cuando les encañonan con una escopeta, dirían cualquier cosa con tal de agraviar a su verdugo».

languages.text: “那些异端分子临死前，无论说出什么胡言乱语，我都不会惊讶。当他们被霰弹枪瞄准的时候，只要是为了报复执法者，他们什么话都说得出来。”
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子临死前，无论说出什么胡言乱语，我都不会惊讶。当他们被霰弹枪瞄准的时候，只要是为了报复执法者，他们什么话都说得出来。”

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin öleceklerini anladıklarında nasıl sövdüklerini görsen... Namluyu alınlarına dayadın mı düşmanı kudurtmak için ağızlarına geleni saydırırlar."
languages.original_text: "You would be surprised by all the garbage that heretics spout before death. Staring down the muzzle of a shotgun, they will say anything just to spite their executioner."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin öleceklerini anladıklarında nasıl sövdüklerini görsen... Namluyu alınlarına dayadın mı düşmanı kudurtmak için ağızlarına geleni saydırırlar."
